statements: SELECT * FROM BiomassResources
SELECT region, biomass_type, biomass_quantity FROM BiomassResources ORDER BY biomass_quantity DESC
SELECT region, biomass_type FROM BiomassResources WHERE biomass_unit = 'kg'
SELECT biomass_type, biomass_quantity FROM BiomassResources WHERE region = 'North America'
SELECT SUM(biomass_quantity) AS total_biomass FROM BiomassResources
SELECT region, biomass_type, biomass_quantity, biomass_unit FROM BiomassResources WHERE region = 'North' AND biomass_quantity > 100 ORDER BY biomass_quantity DESC
SELECT biomass_type, SUM(biomass_quantity) as total_quantity FROM BiomassResources GROUP BY biomass_type HAVING total_quantity > 500 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM BiomassResources WHERE biomass_type LIKE '%wood%' ORDER BY region, biomass_quantity ASC
SELECT region, AVG(biomass_quantity) as avg_quantity FROM BiomassResources WHERE region IN ('East', 'West') GROUP BY region HAVING avg_quantity > 50 ORDER BY avg_quantity DESC
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM BiomassResources WHERE biomass_unit = 'ton' ORDER BY region ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM biomass_resources;
SELECT id, biomass_type, biomass_quantity FROM biomass_resources WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT location, biomass_type, harvest_date FROM biomass_resources ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM biomass_production WHERE production_quantity > 1000;
SELECT id, production_date, production_quantity FROM biomass_production WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY production_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM biomass_resources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, biomass_type, harvest_date FROM biomass_resources WHERE biomass_type = 'Wood' ORDER BY harvest_date DESC;
SELECT id, location, biomass_type, biomass_quantity FROM biomass_resources WHERE location LIKE '%Forest%' ORDER BY biomass_quantity DESC;

SELECT b.id, b.location, p.production_quantity, p.production_date FROM biomass_resources b JOIN biomass_production p ON b.id = p.resource_id WHERE b.biomass_type = 'Crop' ORDER BY p.production_quantity DESC;
SELECT id, location, biomass_quantity FROM biomass_resources WHERE harvest_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM biomass_resources;
SELECT location, biomass_type, biomass_quantity FROM biomass_resources ORDER BY biomass_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_sites WHERE capacity > 100000;
SELECT site_name, location, capacity FROM production_sites WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT id, date, energy_output FROM production_output ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM biomass_resources ORDER BY biomass_quantity DESC, id ASC;
SELECT location, biomass_type FROM biomass_resources WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT site_name, location, capacity FROM production_sites WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM production_output WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT pr.site_name, po.date, po.energy_output FROM production_sites pr JOIN production_output po ON pr.id = po.site_id ORDER BY po.energy_output DESC;
SELECT * FROM biomass_resources;
SELECT id, biomass_type, biomass_quantity FROM biomass_resources;
SELECT region, biomass_type FROM biomass_resources WHERE biomass_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM biomass_producers ORDER BY production_capacity DESC;
SELECT producer_name, production_capacity FROM biomass_producers WHERE region_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM biomass_resources WHERE region = 'East' ORDER BY biomass_quantity DESC;
SELECT producer_name, production_capacity FROM biomass_producers WHERE region_id = '12345-6789' ORDER BY producer_name ASC;
SELECT consumer_name, demand FROM biomass_consumers WHERE region_id = '54321-9876' AND demand > 100 ORDER BY consumer_name ASC;

SELECT producer_name, consumer_name, quantity_sold, transaction_date FROM biomass_producers JOIN biomass_transactions ON biomass_producers.id = biomass_transactions.producer_id JOIN biomass_consumers ON biomass_transactions.consumer_id = biomass_consumers.id WHERE quantity_sold > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT biomass_type, biomass_quantity, region FROM biomass_resources WHERE biomass_quantity >= 1000 ORDER BY region, biomass_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM Biomass_Resources;
SELECT region, biomass_type, quantity FROM Biomass_Distribution WHERE region = 'East';
SELECT biomass_type, conversion_rate FROM Biomass_Conversion ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT MAX(energy_output) AS max_energy_output, MIN(efficiency) AS min_efficiency FROM Biomass_Energy_Performance WHERE region = 'West';
SELECT * FROM Biomass_Transportation WHERE distance > 100 AND transport_cost < 500;
SELECT * FROM Biomass_Resources WHERE region = 'North Region';
SELECT region, biomass_type, quantity FROM Biomass_Resources WHERE quantity > 1000 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT region, distribution_center, delivery_date FROM Biomass_Distribution WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT biomass_type, conversion_technology, conversion_rate FROM Biomass_Conversion WHERE last_updated > '2022-06-30';
SELECT region, transportation_mode, distance, transport_cost FROM Biomass_Transportation WHERE transport_cost < 500 ORDER BY distance DESC;
